member.name: M:TmEssentials.TimeInt32.ToString(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the value of the current to a Trackmania familiar time format.
member.param: If to use the hundredths instead of milliseconds (for better looks on TMUF for example)
If to use ' instead of a colon and '' instead of a dot (to resolve cases where colon is not allowed for example).
member.returns: A string representation of Trackmania time format.

member.name: M:TmEssentials.TimeInt32.ToString
member.summary: Converts the value of the current to a Trackmania familiar time format with milliseconds and without apostrophes.
member.returns: A string representation of Trackmania time format.

member.remarks: This method just calls and exists only for consistency.
